name: NewWay
0:
”Alexa, show me the front camera.”
”Alexa, talk to front camera.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With NewWay ip camera, you can stay connected with what you are in anywhere and any time, access your NewWay ip camera using voice command. Free your hands and enjoy your smart life !

How to get skill?
1. Install your mobile app name is NewWay and login in it, search all device of ip camera. so you can working on the mobile app.
2. From Alexa app, find and enable NewWay skill, login with your mobile app account.
3. Tap discover device in Alexa app to discover your NewWay.

After linking your NewWay APP account and discover your device in your Alexa account, you can start control ip camera to your echo show with voice command like:
"Alexa, show Front Door"

if you want stop the NewWay ip camera from the video, you can say:
"Alexa, stop"


Compatible Amazon Alexa device
* Echo Show
* Echo spot
* Echo Show 2nd gen

Important Notes:
the doorbell support two way talk from Alexa to doorbell.
when you use this skill, you need to specify the name of your doorbell.

more information you can visit https://www.qq-kan.com/

if you have any questions for our skill, please contact our support: jerry_wan@runhualink.com
